solution_line_template: In total, Bryan would have done {num_sets} sets * {pushups_per_set} push-ups/set = <<{num_sets}*{pushups_per_set}={total_pushups_if_all}>>{total_pushups_if_all} push-ups.

Subtracting the push-ups he didn't do in the third set, Bryan did {total_pushups_if_all} push-ups - {fewer_pushups_third_set} push-ups = <<{total_pushups_if_all}-{fewer_pushups_third_set}={total_pushups}>>{total_pushups} push-ups.
